alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 5:30PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow and gusty winds will impact portions of Judith Basin and southwestern Fergus Counties through 600 PM MST... At 527 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy snow and gusty winds along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Geyser to 9 miles west of Hobson to 12 miles northwest of Harlowton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow, wind gusts up to 40 mph, and visibility as low as a half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to significantly reduced visibility and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Denton, Hobson, Moore, Geyser, Windham, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Glengarry, Utica, Garneill, Danvers, Coffee Creek, Hilger, Heath, Buffalo and Benchland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains
